description:
go.talks/present: log websocket close message to console, not popup

On platforms that don't support websockets, this makes the whole
experience a lot less obnoxious.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=27c84def09a6&repo=talks ***

go.talks/present: log websocket close message to console, not popup

On platforms that don't support websockets, this makes the whole
experience a lot less obnoxious.
